extendedIngredients.name: cream cheese
extendedIngredients.originalString: 1-1/2 pkg. (8 oz. each) PHILADELPHIA Cream Cheese (12 oz.), softened

extendedIngredients.name: instant chocolate pudding mix
extendedIngredients.originalString: 1 pkg. (3.9 oz.) JELL-O Chocolate Flavor Instant Pudding

extendedIngredients.name: semi-sweet chocolate
extendedIngredients.originalString: 1-1/2 pkg. (4 oz. each) BAKER'S Semi-Sweet Chocolate (6 oz.), divided

extendedIngredients.name: whipped topping
extendedIngredients.originalString: 2-1/2 cups thawed COOL WHIP Whipped Topping, divided

recipes.title: Chocolate Elegance
recipes.instructions: Beat cream cheese and sugar with mixer until blended.  Gently stir in 1-1/2 cups COOL WHIP; spread 2 cups onto bottom of plastic wrap-lined 8x4-inch loaf pan.                                             Melt 3 oz. chocolate.  Add to remaining cream cheese mixture along with dry pudding mix and milk; beat until blended.  Spread over cream cheese layer in pan.  Refrigerate 4 hours.                                            Microwave remaining chocolate and COOL WHIP in microwaveable bowl on HIGH 1 min.; stir until blended. Cool slightly.                                               Invert dessert onto platter. Remove pan and plastic wrap.  Top dessert with chocolate glaze and nuts.  Refrigerate until glaze is firm.

steps.step: Beat cream cheese and sugar with mixer until blended.  Gently stir in 1-1/2 cups COOL WHIP; spread 2 cups onto bottom of plastic wrap-lined 8x4-inch loaf pan.
Add to remaining cream cheese mixture along with dry pudding mix and milk; beat until blended.
Spread over cream cheese layer in pan.  Refrigerate 4 hours.
Microwave remaining chocolate and COOL WHIP in microwaveable bowl on HIGH 1 min.; stir until blended. Cool slightly.
Remove pan and plastic wrap.  Top dessert with chocolate glaze and nuts.  Refrigerate until glaze is firm.
